mapper.select: select ch.id as id, ch.code as code, ch.name as name, ch.cgr_sql as cgreport_sql, ch.content as content, ch.db_source, ch.return_type from onl_cgreport_head ch where ch.id =#{reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ci.id as id, ci.field_name as field_name, ci.field_txt as field_txt, ci.field_href as field_href, ci.is_show as is_show, ci.field_type as field_type, ci.replace_val as replace_value, ci.dict_code as dict_code, ci.is_search as search_flag, ci.search_mode as search_mode, ci.cgrhead_id as cgreport_head_id from onl_cgreport_item ci where ci.cgrhead_id = #{cgrheadId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ci.order_num asc
